name: What's Inside? (nils gawlik, JackyVintonjek)
description:
This game was made in 8 hours for the Berlin Mini Game Jam March 2019.

In this game you are presented with a package and have to find out what's inside! To do this you choose from a selection of sophisticated scientific methods - such as hitting it with a hammer. But be aware - the contents might be explosive!

Credits:

Jacky (@JVintonjek) -- Art

Laurin -- Game  Design & Sound Effects

Maiken -- Art

Nils (@nilsgawlik) -- Programming
